responsibilities: Conducted a comprehensive research study on the impact of inquiry-based learning models on student retention in secondary STEM classrooms.
Synthesized qualitative data from focus groups with high school educators to identify barriers to digital literacy in low-income districts.
Presented findings on evidence-based classroom management strategies at the Northwest Regional Education Conference.
Applied research-backed pedagogical frameworks to develop and deliver 10th-grade Biology curriculum to a diverse student body.
Utilized data-driven assessment tools to track student progress and adjust instructional strategies based on individual learning needs.
Collaborated with faculty to integrate socio-emotional learning (SEL) research into daily lesson planning.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
